dict.acceptation: 尺寸；[复]面积，范围；[物]量纲；[数]次元，度，维；
把…刨成（或削成）所需尺寸；标出尺寸；

sent.orig: Marxist ethics dimension of the all-round human development is bidirectional: horizontal dimension and vertical dimension.
sent.trans: 马克思主义人的全面发展范畴的伦理学维度是双向的：横向伦理学维度与纵向伦理学维度。

sent.orig: The three dimensions are organization dimension, data dimension and process dimension relatively.
sent.trans: 三个维度分别是组织维度、过程维度和数据维度。

sent.orig: The second step included the capability dimension, the performance dimension and the development potential dimension.
sent.trans: 精选阶段从物流服务能力维度、物流服务绩效维度和物流企业发展潜力维度来考察候选服务商。

sent.orig: It'studies the upper and limit control method of dimension error according to dimension-error control theory.
sent.trans: 从尺寸误差控制理论出发，研究了尺寸误差的上、下限控制方法。

sent.orig: The process dimension chain is calculated by the dimension chain calculating formula of symmetric tolerance marking.
sent.trans: 利用对称公差标注时尺寸链的计算公式，进行工艺尺寸链计算。
